item.text: From Paul and Silvanus and Timothy, to the church of the Thessalonians in God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ. Grace and peace to you!
We thank God always for all of you as we mention you constantly in our prayers,

because we <st data-num="3421" class="">recall</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="1715" class="">presence</st> of <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">Father</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2041" class="">work</st> of <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2873" class="">labor</st> of <st data-num="26" class="">love</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5281" class="">endurance</st> of <st data-num="1680" class="">hope</st><n id="3" /> in <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st>.

We <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="80">brothers and sisters</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="25" class="">loved</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, that he has <st data-num="1589" class="">chosen</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,<n id="3" />
in that our gospel did not come to you merely in words, but in power and in the Holy Spirit and with deep conviction (surely you recall the character we displayed when we came among you to help you).
And you became imitators of us and of the Lord when you received the message with joy that comes from the Holy Spirit, despite great affliction.

<st data-num="5620">As a result</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1096" class="">became</st> an <st data-num="5179" class="">example</st><n id="1" /> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4100" class="">believers</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3109" class="">Macedonia</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="882" class="">Achaia</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> the <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> of the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="1" /> has <st data-num="1837" class="">echoed forth</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3441" class="">just</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3109" class="">Macedonia</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="882" class="">Achaia</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="5117" class="">place</st> reports of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">in</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> have <st data-num="1831" class="">spread</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5620">so that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">we</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="5532" class="">need</st> to <st data-num="2980" class="">say</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">anything</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="846" class="">people</st> everywhere<n id="1" /> <st data-num="518" class="">report</st> <st data-num="1529" class="">how</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1529 2192">welcomed</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">how</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="1994" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="1497" class="">idols</st> to <st data-num="1398" class="">serve</st> the <st data-num="2198" class="">living</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="228" class="">true</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>
and to wait for his Son from heaven, whom he raised from the dead, Jesus our deliverer from the coming wrath.
